title: Prepare a Letter of Intent (LOI)
description: A tenant's agent needs to draft a Letter of Intent to lease a commercial space on behalf of their client.

tasks.description: Gather the key business terms for the offer from the tenant client (e.g., rent rate, lease term, requested TI allowance, use clause).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary terms to draft the LOI.

tasks.description: Use an LOI template to generate a draft document with the client's proposed terms.
Send the draft LOI to the client for review and approval before submitting it to the landlord's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client approves the LOI for submission.
